TEXT.TITLE: NORSTAR <NOR>, FLEET <FLT> TO MERGE
TEXT.BODY: Norstar Bancorp said that its board and the board of Fleet Financial Group have approved a definitive agreement to merge. A Norstar spokesman said that a press release containing further details on the merger would be issued shortly. Reuter
